headline: Dan Schulman’s Appointment as CEO Might Change The Case For Investing In Verizon Communications (VZ)
summary: Verizon Communications recently appointed Dan Schulman, former CEO of PayPal, as its new chief executive, succeeding Hans Vestberg and marking a significant leadership transition effective October 6, 2025. This move brings in an executive with extensive technology and telecom experience at a time when Verizon is preparing to integrate Frontier Communications and address ongoing competitive pressures. We’ll explore how Dan Schulman’s appointment as CEO and his technology background could...

headline: PayPal Stock Cut to Sell at Goldman Sachs. Why Its Tough Year Is Getting Even Rougher.
summary: PayPal  has had a rough year.  Goldman analyst Will Nance cut his rating to Sell from Neutral, citing tougher comparisons to last year’s fourth-quarter strong results as well as concerns about the impact of sticky inflation and the weakening job market on less-affluent customers.  PayPal, the owner of Venmo, has struggled this year in what has been a mixed bag for fintech stocks. For example, rival Block has tumbled 11%, but buy-now-pay-later leader  Affirm  and online lender  SoFi  have soared.

headline: Taylor Swift on Disney+, Beyond Meat nosedives on debt swap
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman discusses three tickers in focus on Monday: Taylor Swift's "The End of an Era" docuseries to stream on Disney's (DIS) streaming service, Beyond Meat (BYND) stock plunging on the company's debt swap, and PayPal (PYPL) getting downgraded. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: PayPal Unveils Ads Manager to Democratize Retail Media for Small Businesses
summary: PayPal Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL) is one of the most promising stocks under $100. On October 7, PayPal unveiled PayPal Ads Manager. The new platform will allow the tens of millions of small businesses that use PayPal to establish their own retail media networks and generate new revenue streams. headline: Digital Payment Today - Spain's Fintech Surge: The Embedded Finance Revolution
summary: Spain's embedded finance market is experiencing robust growth, driven by fintech innovation, regulatory backing, and increased digital adoption across various sectors such as B2B credit, insurance, and payments. The market, which is anticipated to grow by 11.2% in 2025, has been fueled by strategic partnerships and a maturing competitive landscape that embraces open banking and API technology. Trends like platformization and seamless integration of banking and insurance services are shaping...
